alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:58PM EDT until July 17 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fountain County in west central Indiana... Northern Parke County in west central Indiana... Southwestern Warren County in west central Indiana... Northwestern Vermillion County in west central Indiana... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Danville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Covington and Perrysville around 610 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Veedersburg. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
